1052943597123895296.text:
Apologies, I need to retract this. I mistakenly calculated the probability based on *any* bit being set in the bloom filter; it should be based on *all* bits being set.

The correct figure is a mere 0.5%, with an all time high of 1.5% in June.pic.twitter.com/hqAcAw0p1e

1067352308697178113.text: This is an animation of all #Ethereum accounts to date in the order of appearance. The more purple they are, the more Ether they hold.pic.twitter.com/uzICdYUtNV

1067336896349700097.text: Oh, forgot the most important thing: Sorted in order of appearance on Ethereum. Therefore the little purple area at the beginning of column 1 are the Genesis accounts. Can you find the DoS attacks?

1067334941149663232.text:
ALL of Ethereum in one picture!
Every pixel in this image represents 1 account.
